“I saw him last night,” Rodya said. “He tries to slander me.”

Dounia remained silent. Her decision was made. She waited for evening.

“Rodya, what is your decision?” Pulcheria Alexandrovna asked, anxious.

“What decision?” he replied.

“Pyotr Petrovitch says you can’t come tonight. Will you?”

“That's for you and Dounia to decide.”

“Dounia has decided,” Pulcheria declared. “I agree.”

“I urge you to be with us tonight,” Dounia said. “Will you come?”

“Yes.”

“Razumihin will join us too,” she added, looking at him.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Dounia is determined to confront Pyotr Petrovitch and wants Rodya and Razumihin to support her during the meeting.
